divs: sighting detailsi was driving to pick my wife up from the train station at 2:00pm on 11\15\11 and observed an incredibly bright light hovering in the distance. it looked like a car's highbeams would at night. i slowed down to observe it and noticed other drivers looking as well. i was able to observe it for a few minutes until i drove through a wooded area and lost it. it appeared to be at least 10x larger and brighter than any plane or star i have seen in the past.
Summary: Very bright light over paoli, PA
trends: There has been one other sighting in Paoli
There were no other sightings in Paoli on or around November 15th 2011
